property.name: applicationDir
property.description: The folder used for installing file-based-applications, relative to the webapp-root

property.name: appngData
property.description: The data directory for appNG

property.name: cacheApplicationFolder
property.description: The folder for the application-cache, relative to platform.cacheFolder. Applications might use this folder to cache temporary data.

property.name: cacheConfig
property.description: The global configuration for configuring caching. This property either contains the platform-relative path to a config file (e.g. WEB-INF/conf/config.xml) or the XML configuration itself in XML format (stored as clob).

property.name: cacheFolder
property.description: The cache folder, relative to WEB-INF. Contains the platform.cacheFolder and the platform.cacheApplicationFolder.

property.name: cacheImageFolder
property.description: The folder used for caching images, within the application-cache

property.name: cachePlatformFolder
property.description: The folder for the platform-cache, relative to platform.cacheFolder. The platform cache is used by appNG to cache application resources.

property.name: cleanTempFolderOnStartup
property.description: If set to true, the temp folder (defined by the system property java.io.tmpdir) is cleaned on a platform startup. WARNING: Only set to true if appNG was started with a custom value (e.g. -Djava.io.tmpdir=/appng-temp).

property.name: csrfFilterEnabled
property.description: Set to true to enable a filter preventing CSRF-attacks

property.name: databasePrefix
property.description: The prefix to use when generating database names

property.name: databaseValidationPeriod
property.description: The idle database connection test period in minutes. If a database connection remains idle for the specified time, the validation query defined in the database connection will be sent to prevent a database connection timeout.

property.name: defaultTemplate
property.description: The name of the default template to use (must be a folder located under platform.templateFolder)

property.name: devMode
property.description: Disable for production use. If enabled, XML and XSL resources will be written to the cache directory. If disabled, XML and XSL resources will be cached in memory.

property.name: encoding
property.description: The charset/encoding used for http-responses.

property.name: filebasedDeployment
property.description: Set to 'true' if applications should be deployed to the local filesystem, 'false' otherwise.

property.name: formatOutput
property.description: Disable for production use. If enabled, debugging is easier, but Textarea values are formatted wrong.

property.name: imageMagickPath
property.description: The path to the ImageMagick executable

property.name: jspFileType
property.description: The file-extension for JSP-files.

property.name: locale
property.description: The default locale for the site. Use one of java.util.Locale.getAvailableLocales()

property.name: logfile
property.description: The name of the logfile generated by appNG

property.name: mailDisabled
property.description: Set to 'true' to disable mailing and log the e-mails instead.

property.name: mailHost
property.description: The mail-host to use.

property.name: mailPort
property.description: The mail-port to use

property.name: manageDatabases
property.description: If set to 'true', appNG will manage the databases (create schemas and users) required by the applications.

property.name: maxUploadSize
property.description: The maximum size for file uploads in bytes

property.name: mdcEnabled
property.description: Set to 'true' to enable support for Mapped Diagnostic Context (MDC) Logging.

property.name: messagingEnabled
property.description: Set to true to enable cluster messaging

property.name: messagingGroupAddress
property.description: The multicast address used for messaging

property.name: messagingGroupPort
property.description: The port used for multicast messaging

property.name: messagingReceiver
property.description: Define messaging implementation by referring class name. Default method is multicast

property.name: monitorPerformance
property.description: Set to true to enable performance monitoring for the target XML

property.name: passwordPolicyErrorMessageKey
property.description: The resource-bundle key (for messages-core) for the message which is being displayed when the password does not match the policy.

property.name: passwordPolicyRegEx
property.description: A regular expression describing the password-policy

property.name: platformRootPath
property.description: The absolute root-path of the platform

property.name: repositoryCert
property.description: The certificate to use when verifying a signed remote repository (PEM format)

property.name: repositoryDefaultDigest
property.description: The default digest for a published local application repository

property.name: repositoryPath
property.description: The folder used for the repositories of the site, relative to the webapp-root

property.name: repositorySignature
property.description: The private key to use when signing a local published repository (PEM format)

property.name: repositoryTrustStore
property.description: The truststore used when verifying a signed remote repository, using file-protocol. If empty, the default $java.home/lib/security/cacerts is being used.

property.name: repositoryTrustStorePassword
property.description: The truststore's password

property.name: repositoryVerifySignature
property.description: When set to 'true', signed remote repositories are validated against the configured (or default) truststore.

property.name: sessionTimeout
property.description: The timeout for a user session in seconds

property.name: sharedSecret
property.description: The shared secret used for digest authentication

property.name: templateFolder
property.description: The folder used for templates, relative to the webapp-root

property.name: templatePrefix
property.description: The path under which the resources of the active template are beeing served.

property.name: timeZone
property.description: The default timezone for the site. Use one of java.util.TimeZone.getAvailableIDs().

property.name: uploadDir
property.description: The folder for saving uploads, relative to the webapp-root

property.name: vHostMode
property.description: Defines whether the server is identified by its IP ('IP_BASED') or by its name ('NAME_BASED')

property.name: writeDebugFiles
property.description: When set to 'true', the XML, XSLT and potential Exceptions occurring on a request to the appNG manager GUI are written to <platformRootPath>/debug

property.name: xssAllowedTags
property.value: a href class style|div align style
property.defaultValue: a href class style|div align style
property.description: A list of additionally allowed HTML Tags, separated by '|', optionally followed by a space-separated list of allowed attributes. Example :h1|h2|a href class style|div align style

property.name: xssProtect
property.description: Set to 'true' to enable XSS protection
